snippet.title: I, Hope - Story Video
snippet.description: Kenny Roy of Arconyx Studios explains the story behind his first title I, Hope.  This 3D platforming game follows Hope, a young girl whose life is turned upside down when a mysterious monster named Cancer falls from sky and lands on her island home. The gameplay centers around discovering unique abilities entrenched within magical floating islands in order to solve puzzles and defeat enemies. “I, Hope” is being developed by Arconyx Studios and will be donated in its entirety to GameChanger Charity with 100% of the profits going directly toward benefiting children with life-threatening illnesses and their families.
